net.foxycorndog.jfoxylib.input

Class Mouse

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.foxycorndog.jfoxylib.input.Mouse

  • public class Mouse
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that is used to calculate and obtain information about the Mouse and cursor.
    Since:
    Mar 9, 2013 at 3:08:15 AM, v0.1
    Version:
    May 22, 2013 at 9:06:15 PM, v0.2
    Author:
    Braden Steffaniak

    • Method Detail

      • setLocation

        public static void setLocation(int x,
               int y)
        Set the location of the cursor to the specified location on the Monitors display.
        Parameters:
        x - The horizontal location from left to right. (left = 0)
        y - The vertical location from top to bottom. (top = 0)

      • getX

        public static int getX()
        Get the integer form of the Pointers horizontal location in the Frame.
        Returns:
        The horizontal location of the Pointer in the Frame.

      • getY

        public static int getY()
        Get the integer form of the pointers vertical location in the Frame.
        Returns:
        The vertical location of the pointer in the Frame.

      • getDisplayX

        public static int getDisplayX()
        Get the pointers horizontal location in the Monitors Display.
        Returns:
        The pointers horizontal location in the Monitors Display.

      • getDisplayY

        public static int getDisplayY()
        Get the pointers vertical location in the Monitors Display.
        Returns:
        The pointers vertical location in the Monitors Display.

      • getDX

        public static int getDX()
        Get the displacement horizontal value of the cursor since the last frame.
        Returns:
        The displacement horizontal value of the cursor.

      • getDY

        public static int getDY()
        Get the displacement vertical value of the cursor since the last frame.
        Returns:
        The displacement vertical value of the cursor.

      • isButtonDown

        public static boolean isButtonDown(int button)
        Returns whether the specified button is down.

        left mouse button = 0
        right mouse button = 1
        mouse wheel button = 2
        Parameters:
        button -
        Returns:

      • isGrabbed

        public static boolean isGrabbed()
        Returns whether the mouse is grabbed by the Frame.
        Returns:
        Whether the mouse is grabbed by the Frame.

      • setGrabbed

        public static void setGrabbed(boolean grabbed)
        Set whether the mouse should be grabbed by the Frame or not.
        Parameters:
        grabbed - Whether the Frame should grab the mouse or not.

      • getDWheel

        public static int getDWheel()
        Get the displacement of the mouse wheel.
        Returns:
        The displacement value of the mouse wheel.

      • isInFrame

        public static boolean isInFrame()
        Returns whether the Mouse cursor is inside the bounds of the Frame.
        Returns:
        Whether the Mouse cursor is inside the bounds of the Frame.

      • update

        public static void update()
        Method used to update the Mouse each frame. Does all of the calculations for displacements and also notifies the listeners for their appropriate calls.

      • addMouseListener

        public static boolean addMouseListener(MouseListener listener)
        Add a MouseListener to be notified for actions.
        Parameters:
        listener - The MouseListener instance to be used.
        Returns:
        Whether the add was successful.

      • removeMouseListener

        public static boolean removeMouseListener(MouseListener listener)
        Remove the specified MouseListener from the list to be called.
        Parameters:
        listener - The MouseListener to remove.
        Returns:
        Whether the remove was successful.
